name: Zombie Mrs. Hatchet (2022)
additionalNotes:
Known for their limited, small-batch releases, Viaje presents a fabulous line extension to the original Farmer Bill Hatchet.  Released in 2022, Viaje Zombie Mrs. Hatchet, the wife of Farmer Bill, takes center stage as this years highly anticipated Thanksgiving offering. Expertly rolled in a perfectly box pressed (6 x 52) Toro, Mrs. Hatchet follows suit with the rest of Viajeâ€™s Thanksgiving-themed cigars by boasting an undisclosed blend of tobaccos.
